name: Pieces
overview: A brain logic game created in 1996 by Özden Irmak & Mert Hekimci along with Timo Buschmann graphics and Balázs Bócsa for music\sound. Match the like pieces, but be careful to get all the like ones in pairs or at one time. A stranded shape will halt the game. Simply put like pieces side by side to remove them.
